Tag_Youmay.description: weekly contract | [[The Fear of Arrows]], the daily contract

General_Description: '''The Belladonna Kiss''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Archer]]s fill the sky with volleys of arrows. [[Civilian]]s fear them more than [[sword]]s or [[spear]]s. Lower their numbers, just to make civilians more comfortable."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra killed [[archer]]s and [[Athens|Athenian]] [[Marksman|marksmen]] all over [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
